biblioref.abbrev: bibliographical reference [link to bibliography in "Author_Date" format to specific #Author_Date marker in bibliography page (bibliography page: ../biblio/biblio.html).]
biblioref.pagenums: page numbers [single number, two numbers separated by dash or several numbers separated by comma (45 or 45-46 or 45-46, 48,55) No further link.]
biblioref.abbrev2: bibliographical reference to secondary publication [link to bibliography in "Author_Date Page(s)" format; links to specific #Author_Date marker in bibliography page (bibliography page: ../biblio/biblio.html).]
biblioref.pagenums2: page numbers for secondary reference [single number, two numbers separated by dash or several numbers separated by comma (45 or 45-46 or 45-46, 48,55) No further link.]

algorithm_description.algorithm_type: from set of possibilities, each linked to a static HTML page. Link created should be ../ty/ENTRY.html where ENTRY is the algorithm type with spaces replaced by underscore (_)
algorithm_description.position_in_process: from set of possibilities, each linked to a static HTML page Link created should be ../pr/ENTRY.html
algorithm_description.material: from set of possibilities, each linked to a static HTML page. Link created should be ../ma/ENTRY.html
algorithm_description.source_type: from set of possibilities, each linked to a static HTML page. Link created should be ../so/ENTRY.html
algorithm_description.source_chronology: from set of possibilities, each linked to a static HTML page. Link created should be ../sc/ENTRY.html
algorithm_description.source_geography: from set of possibilities, each linked to a static HTML page. Link created should be ../sg/ENTRY.html

algdata.algorithm_statement: in statement format, to be used as title
algdata.algorithm_math: algorithm in mathematical format, to be used as display on algorithm page

var1.op: [operation in function of other variables (e.g. var2 * 5 )]

algnotes.biblio_notes: a general note file on the biliography

author.creation_date: only in dd.mm.yyyy format. Only one allowed per algorithm.

author.modification_date: only in dd.mm.yyyy format. Only one allowed per algorithm.
